availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Hancock County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary E. Chappell Barker in Hancock County on June 24, 1845. Father of Elizabeth Barker. Farmer in Hancock County in 1850. Farmer in Hancock County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Hancock County, p. 100.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Hancock County Marriages, Film #000495729.
Find A Grave, "Reuben N. Barker (November 8, 1818-December 8, 1893)," Memorial #90196731, http://www.findagrave.com/memorial/90196731 (accessed April 11, 2017).
